name: Parking Lot Lines
description:
Direct the cars to a suitable space in Parking Lot Lines!

You run the parking lot and it's your job to park every car appropriately. When the cars come in, draw a line to take them to a suitable space.

Watch the movement of other cars! Avoid hitting another car and potentially causing a crash. Let cars rest a while if necessary, before an opening comes in.

Cars will automatically vacate their spaces after a while. Watch as new spaces open up and fill them with cars to keep earning.

Expand your lot! As you earn money from parking fees, you'll be able to open up more spaces and increase your earnings by holding more automobiles simultaneously.

Choose the correct space—family spots, compacts, handicapped spaces, and more specialized parking requirements must be matched correctly to the driver. Try to use every possible space.

Draw, park, earn, and expand in Parking Lot Lines NOW!
